attributes.action: Make it compulsory to  get into the nearside lane  400 yards before the exit of a motorway
attributes.additional_details:
Some drivers   decide at the last minute  that they want to exit from the motorway.   They sometimes veer  dangerously from  lane two or even lane three   into  the nearside lane   within a few yards of the exit lane.

Therefore  some measure or legislation or additional road markings (such as Continuous white line)  needs to  be introduced to prevent   vehicles  crossing over from the middle lane   "too late"
